beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE TCDT051 USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}TCDT051.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CVE_REG from TCDT051_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_AGRUP=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0715'

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO REFERENCED_COD_CVE_RGTRO from TCDT051_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO ref on (base.COD_TIPO_NIVEL=ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_CATALOGO='0014'

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO  USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO .csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from TCDT051_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp1 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO  ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CENTRO REFERENCED_COD_CENTRO from TCDT051_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp2 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO  ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_CENTRO_GRAL=ref.COD_CENTRO and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CENTRO REFERENCED_COD_CENTRO from TCDT051_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp3 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO  ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_CENTRO_SUP=ref.COD_CENTRO and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1 union all select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated_and_domain2 union all select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated_and_domain3 union all select * from errors_TCDT051_standardized_and_validated_and_domain4
